an4.82:1.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.82:1.3: They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical.
an4.82:1.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.82:2.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.82:2.3: They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical.
an4.82:2.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
